snippet.title: Corpse Killer (1994) PC (Part 1/2) Walkthrough
snippet.description:
╔═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╗
►║|   OPEN ME FOR MORE INFOS   |║◄
╚═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╝

!IMPORTANT! The following parts of this walkthrough will be published part by part every Wednesday and Saturday for subscribers. Channel members can instantly view all parts.

On this channel you will find tons of first person games as an archive for ALL first person games ever published is created here. The videos show you the first 15-30 minutes of gameplay without any comment, as I don't want to influence anyone with my opinion. If you like a game, I almost always have links in the info box where you can get the game (legal) without much searching. If you like the channel, you are welcome to leave me a subscription. THX

Corpse Killer (1994) PC (Part 1/2) Walkthrough

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Info:◄
https://www.mobygames.com/game/corpse-killer

https://ogdb.eu/index.php?section=title&titleid=1081

https://www.igdb.com/games/corpse-killer

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►The Hall:◄ --- German/Deutsch
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=3

►The Hall:◄ --- English
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=2

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Walkthrough Part 2:◄
https://youtu.be/W-PkK5fy4F4

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Gameplay:◄
02:01 - Drop Zone
02:57 - Airstrip
04:14 - Zombietown
04:52 - Gate
05:41 - Hellman TV
06:26 - To Swamp
06:33 - Swamp
07:33 - Hellman TV
08:04 - To Village
08:23 - Village
09:22 - Hellman TV
10:08 - To Fortress
10:35 - Fortress
11:10 - Courtyard
11:40 - Into Altar
12:11 - Outer Altar
12:25 - Hellman TV
12:58 - Altar
13:05 - Inner Altar (Boss)
15:00 - Graveyard
16:09 - Satlink Map
16:37 - Bone Plate
17:00 - Datura Plant
17:25 - Lifeblood
17:35 - Antidote
17:52 - Light Shadowman
17:58 - Dark Shadowman
17:03 - Ju-Ju Stick
18:15 - Magliano
19:09 - Hummer
19:14 - Bones
19:22 - Top Secret
19:47 - Zombie Seal
20:03 - Graves
20:14 - Barnes
20:49 - Hellman
20:59 - Hanja Root
21:13 - Datura Bullets
20:31 - Dr. Hellman
23:16 - AP Shells
23:39 - Datapod Info
24:00 - En Route
24:05 - Totem Ruins
24:37 - Returning
24:42 - Graveyard
24:46 - Datapod
24:58 - Winston & Julie
25:13 - Ambush
25:44 - Winston
26:48 - Datapod 
26:57 - Winston
27:47 - Galleon
28:20 - Winston
28:52 - Datapod
29:00 - Winston
29:13 - Ambush
29:20 - Winston
29:27 - Datapod
29:31 - Winston & Julie
29:46 - Ambush
30:17 - Winston
30:24 - Datapod
30:29 - Julie
30:54 - Near Depot
31:22 - Returning
31:30 - Graveyard
32:00 - Datapod
32:05 - Supply Depot

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►You can get the game here:◄

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1087700/Corpse_Killer__25th_Anniversary_Edition/

Affiliate links: If you buy something through these links, I get a small commission without the price changing for you. This way you can support this channel if you want

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Hall Support:◄

My Channel Supporter:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/join

Abo / Sub:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw?sub_confirmation=1

G2A (Affiliate link) :
https://www.g2a.com/r/gr-5e68d48b2d24e

G2A Join my team to support me: 
Please ask for an Invite link 

Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=19996679

https://www.tipeeestream.com/hofpg/donation
